ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s time for the ninth issue of the Bob’s Burgers comic book! Feast your eyes on new mouth-watering stories from the Belchers. Louise eagerly awaits Tina’s tale in The Why-Files, Part 2; Gene rhymes up a new rhyme; and readers can sit right back and hear a tale, a tale of a fateful trip, here on Tinagan’s Island. Everyone loves Bob’s Burgers, the fan-favorite animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Tina's IslandLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities Presents: The Why Files, Part 2Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: The Gene-As Touch*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joe Healy | 1 | B | Cover B | Luke Ashworth | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Joe Healy | 3 | D/RE | Exceed Comic: A Divison of Jesse James Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 4 |

ComicInfo.Penciller: Circus Leveo, Kimball Shirley, Sara Richard, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Inker: Circus Leveo, Kimball Shirley, Sara Richard, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Editor: Joseph Rybandt, Kevin Ketner, Rachel Pinnelas
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
